message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to invest in something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering its worth $10,000 to you, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings to your operations.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay a premium for a quality product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I still believe the product is worth more than $9,000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway on your latest offer, so I'll counter with $10,250. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product at $10,250, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer it to you for $10,750. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll offer $10,500, which is the highest I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product at $10,500, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer it to you for $10,750, but this is my final offer. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product.

I understand that you're unwilling to budge further, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll offer $10,000, which is the absolute maximum I'm willing to pay. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
